Header.title: Welcome to Apto
Header.paragraph: Wanna workout?? Pay only for what you use

About.paragraph: Fitness is not just a sense of fasion or meant for certain people, its a way of living and also under the current scenario, staying fit costs a lot
Why: Do you go to a gym?
Do you pay a monthly fee and skip half the time?
Did you stop because it wasted your money?
Why overpay... We at Apto are to help you pay only for the days you actually work out
Why2: We are in the beta phase, we appericiate your visit so soon
As a token of our appericiation let us give you a gift
Pre register and get one work out free per a month for a year at any of our partner gyms
Pre register for the benifit, limited slots available... Hurry!!!

Services.name: No more Overpayment
Services.text: Dont pay for days you dont visit, pay for the day and workout

Services.name: Be like them
Services.text: An oppertunity to be fit with people you admire

Features.title: 24x7 support
Features.text: We at Apto care about you, will help you out anytime you want

Features.title: Offers that we offer
Features.text: A happy customer makes a happy company, and our regular benifit announcements surely are gonna make you happy

Features.title: Be fit with everyone
Features.text: Why enjoy the magic alone, help more people in joining with us and get special rewards too

Features.title: Works like magic
Features.text: Pay for just the days you work out, sounds like magic right, well we got the wand with us.. Abra kadabra
